text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Like other DOT.NET Framework application RSS Bandit supports configuration options specified in a file named

text.style: font-family:Tahoma; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: . The location is always the path you installed the program, usually

text.style: font-family:Tahoma; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: and can be edited with a normal text editor like Notepad or your favourite XML editor.
This file defines e.g. options to allow execution with currently released CLR runtime version (

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: entries), but also some specific options only valid for RSS Bandit. This options are all located within one section named

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The recommended way to change some of the options there is to create a new file with the name "

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: " in the same directory. You should remind we will overwrite the original RssBandit.exe.config file each time you install an update of the application! As long you choose the same folder for uninstall/reinstall your newly created file will be left untouched but used with your customized options.
The contents of the file must look like this:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Each application option entry must be specified in this format:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#007fff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#007fff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: So here is a more complete sample:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#007fff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#ff0000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#007fff; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#800080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: The following table describes all known and supported options with the allowed values.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:15px; margin-right:15px; margin-bottom:15px; margin-left:23px; line-height:1.0; background-color:#ffffcc; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; padding:7px; border-color:#999999; border-style:single; border-width:1px; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: : the option keys must be spelled exactly as they are specified below!

para.style: line-height:1.0; background-color:#ffffff; border-style:single; border-width:3px; border-top:none; border-right:none; border-left:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:1px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; cell-border-width:2px; border-color:#a0a0a0; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Amount of threads used to request feeds.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: By default we consider the feed element tag <slash:comments> (namespace http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/slash/) containing the amount of comments posted to detect if we have to request the comment feed for a particular post. If the counter is zero, we will not request the comment feed, but if you set this option to true, we will always request the comment feed regardless the value of the counter.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Set this to false if you consider any bad UI rendering effects while running software, that tweaks the windows default color scheme handling (Custom theme manager; Windows XP and higher) to provide "extended" schemes like the well known Window Blinds or StyleXP applications.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: If you reply to a post (feed must support this), a short string is used as a prefix similar to Outlook/Outlook express. If you really like to have English reply title prefix "Re: " instead of the localized (in German e.g. "AW: "), set this value to true.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: String (Operating System Path); default is <Documents and Settings>\<LoggedOnUser>\Application Data\RssBandit; this is usually part of Windows

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: You can specify a custom path here like "D:\My Feeds\RSS Bandit". Do not forget to copy all the files from the original location and RSS Bandit should not be running while you do so!

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: String (Operating System Path); default is <Documents and Settings>\<LoggedOnUser>\Local Settings\ Application Data\RssBandit; this is usually

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: You can specify a custom path here like "D:\My Feeds\RSS Bandit". It is allowed to specify the same path as used for setting

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: to have all related files in one location. Do not forget to copy all the files from the original location and RSS Bandit should not be running while you do so!

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: String; the following values are supported (case sensitive):

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: - no search index is build/maintained, and local search feature is disabled

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: - Index is directory based and build relative to the user's local application data folder (

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: - Index is directory based and build relative to the user's application data folder

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: - Index is directory based and build relative to the user's temporary folder

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: By default we send cookies written by Internet Explorer (if they match the site) along with the feed request. Some feeds/hosts manage access to the feeds by informations stored in a cookie.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: (do not use spaces in the key name!)
Disable (false) this setting to configure the ACTIVE MODE for

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:11pt; font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: Settings below are not anymore valid for v1.5.x:

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#808080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Security setting for the feed detail view pane. Allow/Deny to execute Active X components.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#808080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Security setting for the feed detail view pane. Allow/Deny download/display if images.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#808080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Security setting for the feed detail view pane. Allow/Deny to execute Java components.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#808080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Security setting for the feed detail view pane. Allow/Deny to play video media components.

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#808080; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Security setting for the feed detail view pane. Allow/Deny HTML frames support.
v1.3.0.42; v1.5.x don't use it anymore
